mapper.select: select id, name, parent_id, url, icon, type, sort, created, create_id, updated, update_id, is_delete, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4 from sms_menu where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sms_menu(name, parent_id, url, icon, type, sort, created, create_id, updated, update_id, is_delete, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4) values (#{name}, #{parentId}, #{url}, #{icon}, #{type}, #{sort}, #{created}, #{createId}, #{updated}, #{updateId}, #{isDelete}, #{extend1}, #{extend2}, #{extend3}, #{extend4})

insert into sms_menu(name, parent_id, url, icon, type, sort, created, create_id, updated, update_id, is_delete, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.created}, #{entity.createId}, #{entity.updated}, #{entity.updateId}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.extend1}, #{entity.extend2}, #{entity.extend3}, #{entity.extend4})

insert into sms_menu(name, parent_id, url, icon, type, sort, created, create_id, updated, update_id, is_delete, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.created}, #{entity.createId}, #{entity.updated}, #{entity.updateId}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.extend1}, #{entity.extend2}, #{entity.extend3}, #{entity.extend4})
on duplicate key update name = values(name), parent_id = values(parent_id), url = values(url), icon = values(icon), type = values(type), sort = values(sort), created = values(created), create_id = values(create_id), updated = values(updated), update_id = values(update_id), is_delete = values(is_delete), extend1 = values(extend1), extend2 = values(extend2), extend3 = values(extend3), extend4 = values(extend4)
mapper.update:
update sms_menu
name = #{name},
parent_id = #{parentId},
url = #{url},
icon = #{icon},
type = #{type},
sort = #{sort},
created = #{created},
create_id = #{createId},
updated = #{updated},
update_id = #{updateId},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
extend1 = #{extend1},
extend2 = #{extend2},
extend3 = #{extend3},
extend4 = #{extend4},
where id = #{id}
